Guesser Mode
  • Guesser Mode
    • ON: Guesser Mode will be enabled
      • Crewmates can guess
        • ON: Crewmates can guess players' roles
      • Impostors can guess
        • ON: Impostors can guess players' roles
        • OFF: Impostors cannot guess players' roles
      • Neutral Killers can guess
        • ON: Neutral Killers can guess players' roles
        • OFF: Neutral Killers cannot guess players' roles
      • Passive Neutrals can guess
        • ON: Passive Neutrals can guess players' roles
        • OFF: Passive Neutrals cannot guess players' roles
      • Can Guess Add-ons
        • ON: Add-ons can be guessed
        • OFF: Add-ons cannot be guessed
      • Crewmates Can Guess Crewmate Roles
        • ON: Crewmates can guess other crewmates' roles
        • OFF: Crewmates cannot guess other crewmates' roles
      • Impostors Can Guess Impostor Roles
        • ON: Impostors can guess other impostors' roles
        • OFF: Impostors cannot guess other impostors' roles
      • Try to hide guesser's commands
        • ON: Guessers' commands will be hidden
        • OFF: Guessers' commands will be shown
    • OFF: Guesser Mode will be disabled
  • Roles and Add-ons for Guesser Mode
    • Onbound
      • Max
        • Set the maximum amount of Onbound that can spawn
      • Spawn Chance
        • Set the chance that Onbound role will spawn
      • Impostors can become Onbound
        • ON: Impostors can become Onbound
        • OFF: Impostors cannot become Onbound
      • Crewmates can become Onbound
        • ON: Crewmates can become Onbound
        • OFF: Crewmates cannot become Onbound
      • Neutrals can become Onbound
        • ON: Neutrals can become Onbound
        • OFF: Neutrals cannot become Onbound

From: Moe
